verses.name: Ezekiel 35:8
verses.text: And I will fill his mountains with his slain men: in thy hills, and in thy valleys, and in all thy rivers, shall they fall that are slain with the sword.

verses.name: Ezekiel 35:9
verses.text: I will make thee perpetual desolations, and thy cities shall not return: and ye shall know that I am the Lord.

verses.name: Ezekiel 35:10
verses.text: Because thou hast said, These two nations and these two countries shall be mine, and we will possess it; whereas the Lord was there:
